notifications.name: Huggy Sugar-Gold
notifications.title: Property Owner
notifications.text: Hello, you two! I see that you're both prepared to to work... Well, great! You have a lot to do around here.

notifications.name: Huggy Sugar-Gold
notifications.title: Property Owner
notifications.text: What do I mean? Look at this place! There is not even a Shed to lock our tools in! How are my people supposed to work in an environment like this... Shed, you understand?

notifications.name: Huggy Sugar-Gold
notifications.title: Property Owner
notifications.text: You need my help? Why do I-.....Just. Grab the trash.

notifications.name: Huggy Sugar-Gold
notifications.title: Property Owner
notifications.text: Great job! See, now this place looks half decent! I can already see it, the stores, the items, the hungry, starving collectors with rivers of money... Anyways, Here's the rest I owe you.

notifications.name: Huggy Sugar-Gold
notifications.title: Property Owner
notifications.text: What are you still doing here? I can't be the only customer you have! There is plenty of people who have been affected by those monkeys...

notifications.name: Huggy Sugar-Gold
notifications.title: Property Owner
notifications.text: Well, well, well, look who decided to show up for round two. I had to practically babysit you to clean up the last dump I gave you. Hope you've sharpened your act because I've got something new for you.

notifications.name: Huggy Sugar-Gold
notifications.title: Property Owner
notifications.text: I need a wind turbine on this property and a Trash Collector for all of this shit these donkeys keep throwing to the river. Time is money.

notifications.name: Huggy Sugar-Gold
notifications.title: Property Owner
notifications.text: Why do you need MY help to check some batteries? Just look in the Shed and the Wind turbine, cm'on there is 2 of you!

notifications.name: Huggy Sugar-Gold
notifications.title: Property Owner
notifications.text: Well, I'll be damned. You actually pulled it off and got that wind turbine up and running. Color me impressed.

notifications.name: Huggy Sugar-Gold
notifications.title: Property Owner
notifications.text: Looks like I didn't completely waste my time on you. You want more cash? Keep delivering results.

notifications.name: Huggy Sugar-Gold
notifications.title: Property Owner
notifications.text: You've stuck around longer than most., huh... I guess you're not entirely useless. We've got bigger plans, now.

notifications.name: Huggy Sugar-Gold
notifications.title: Property Owner
notifications.text: I will be honest to you, I have no time. Build a shed, hamster wheels, recycling workshop. Get it done.

notifications.name: Huggy Sugar-Gold
notifications.title: Property Owner
notifications.text: Meet me at the shed once you've got everything. Let's make this place a damn powerhouse.

notifications.name: Huggy Sugar-Gold
notifications.title: Property Owner
notifications.text: You've really stepped up your game on this final property. As for those polluting clowns, they must be sweating in their toxic fumes now.

notifications.name: Huggy Sugar-Gold
notifications.title: Property Owner
notifications.text: We've got a plan in the works, and when it hits, they'll wish they never crossed paths with us. Stay sharp, we're just getting started.

notifications.name: Greasy Jim Winterkorn
notifications.title: Craftsman
notifications.text: Hey mates! Soo, ye see, I've been doin a lot here... Still I need som' help. So just... do yer thing, yeah? I'm... I got otha stuff to do.

notifications.name: Greasy Jim Winterkorn
notifications.title: Craftsman
notifications.text: Ye see, I need a place to work. Somethin' like a Recycling Workshop, so I can do somethin' about all this trash they keep throwing ou' way...

notifications.name: Greasy Jim Winterkorn
notifications.title: Craftsman
notifications.text: Yeah... Huh? Whatcha mean, ye aint done nothin' yet! Aishh, I aint got all day, mate! Just fixin' alla that, easy!

notifications.name: Greasy Jim Winterkorn
notifications.title: Craftsman
notifications.text: Sheat, look at this, haha, I knew ye could do it. Here' the payment. Maybe one day ye can make a place like this for yerselves.

notifications.name: Greasy Jim Winterkorn
notifications.title: Craftsman
notifications.text: Yeah Yeah, my boss it sureley gon like this, hehe. Easy work, anotha easy day fo' me.

notifications.name: Greasy Jim Winterkorn
notifications.title: Craftsman
notifications.text: Ayy! Look who it is, back for round two in this place. Found meself wanderin' in again, ya know, just takin' in the sights. Always discoverin' new places, it's a knack of mine. How's life treatin' ya?

notifications.name: Greasy Jim Winterkorn
notifications.title: Craftsman
notifications.text: How 'bout we make this place even more cozy? You know, a proper craftsman's touch. Let's set up a proper Recycling Workshop, right here on these grounds. And a well, a sturdy one, for when we're parched from all the hard work. I'll supervise, of course, but yer the hands for the job!

notifications.name: Greasy Jim Winterkorn
notifications.title: Craftsman
notifications.text: Grab a sack, a sturdy one, none of them flimsy things. We're on a quest â€“ huntin' for the gems in the junk. And, don't forget the buckets! We need water, the drink of life for our craftin' escapades.

notifications.name: Greasy Jim Winterkorn
notifications.title: Craftsman
notifications.text: Well blow me down and call me a sailor, you've gone and done it!

notifications.name: Greasy Jim Winterkorn
notifications.title: Craftsman
notifications.text: Time to part ways, mate. Can't stand the pollution hangin' in the air. I'm off to find a breath of fresh air. Farewell, and may yer craft always flourish.

notifications.name: Greasy Jim Winterkorn
notifications.title: Craftsman
notifications.text: Look who's stumbled back into the workshop, eh? This place, me pride, torn down by them landlubbin' scoundrels. It's a downright bother, I tell ya. Blood's boilin', and I've had a tipple too many. What in blazes are we gonna do about this, eh? They can't just stomp over honest craftsmanship!

notifications.name: Greasy Jim Winterkorn
notifications.title: Craftsman
notifications.text: I need ye to build me a shed, some hamster wheels, and a trash collector, yeah? Here's the deal: we're gonna turn this setup into a Recycling Workshop, right under the nose of those polluting scoundrels in that big, nasty company.

notifications.name: Greasy Jim Winterkorn
notifications.title: Craftsman
notifications.text: Head to the shed, grab some scrap on yer way, and toss a bite to the rats. We need a private spot for a chat. Meet me there, and we'll talk about what needs doin'.

notifications.name: Greasy Jim Winterkorn
notifications.title: Craftsman
notifications.text: We're onto somethin' big here. Once we've got all the pieces in place, we'll unleash our little surprise on those polluters.

notifications.name: Greasy Jim Winterkorn
notifications.title: Craftsman
notifications.text: Yeah Yeah, they won't know what hit 'em. Easy work, anotha easy victory for us!

notifications.name: Ovaltine Vinaigrette
notifications.title: Grand Dame
notifications.text: You...

notifications.name: Ovaltine Vinaigrette
notifications.title: Grand Dame
notifications.text: Ugh! A step back!..... Clean up the place.... and, huh, yourselves... meet me with a cup of fresh water when you're done.

notifications.name: Ovaltine Vinaigrette
notifications.title: Grand Dame
notifications.text: Here.

notifications.name: Ovaltine Vinaigrette
notifications.title: Grand Dame
notifications.text: Disgusting... Why are they always so.... dirty.

notifications.name: Ovaltine Vinaigrette
notifications.title: Grand Dame
notifications.text: Ensure this place is at least presentable... Let's hope for improvement.

notifications.name: Ovaltine Vinaigrette
notifications.title: Grand Dame
notifications.text: Hah! No, no... It can't be that hard to do work by yourselves...

notifications.name: Ovaltine Vinaigrette
notifications.title: Grand Dame
notifications.text: Water...

notifications.name: Ovaltine Vinaigrette
notifications.title: Grand Dame
notifications.text: This... this water tastes fresh... Even though it did not come from a filter...

notifications.name: Ovaltine Vinaigrette
notifications.title: Grand Dame
notifications.text: I guess natural sometimes is better...

notifications.name: Ovaltine Vinaigrette
notifications.title: Grand Dame
notifications.text: You, two! Yes, yes, I... This place is very important.

notifications.name: Ovaltine Vinaigrette
notifications.title: Grand Dame
notifications.text: Just... We need to get some things fixed... I need some Hamsters and a Recycling Table.

notifications.name: Ovaltine Vinaigrette
notifications.title: Grand Dame
notifications.text: Meet me at the Shed... You cleaned it right? If... if I see a spider in there...

notifications.name: Ovaltine Vinaigrette
notifications.title: Grand Dame
notifications.text: It's good we agreed on a plan... I would have to keep on living in...uhg. You have won, alright?

notifications.name: Ovaltine Vinaigrette
notifications.title: Grand Dame
notifications.text: I can't let those smokey devils kill all of this... Its so delightful to be in here...

notifications.name: Miss Baby Stevens
notifications.title: On duty Baby
notifications.text: Ah! Uhh... Agabagabada.

notifications.name: Miss Baby Stevens
notifications.title: On duty Baby
notifications.text: Aahh.

notifications.name: Miss Baby Stevens
notifications.title: On duty Baby
notifications.text: Hic...Hic.....A....AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHH...!

notifications.name: Miss Baby Stevens
notifications.title: On duty Baby
notifications.text: Hehehehehe! Yeeehhh!

notifications.name: Miss Baby Stevens
notifications.title: On duty Baby
notifications.text: Ah...

notifications.name: Miss Baby Stevens
notifications.title: On duty Baby
notifications.text: Ah!!

notifications.name: Miss Baby Stevens
notifications.title: On duty Baby
notifications.text: Mmm, awh... A-watah....

notifications.name: Miss Baby Stevens
notifications.title: On duty Baby
notifications.text: Hahahahahaha!

notifications.name: Miss Baby Stevens
notifications.title: On duty Baby
notifications.text: Mmm...

notifications.name: Miss Baby Stevens
notifications.title: On duty Baby
notifications.text: AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHH!!!

notifications.name: Miss Baby Stevens
notifications.title: On duty Baby
notifications.text: AAAAAHHHAAAAAAAAA.....!

notifications.name: Miss Baby Stevens
notifications.title: On duty Baby
notifications.text: Humph!

notifications.name: Miss Baby Stevens
notifications.title: On duty Baby
notifications.text: Revolt. Destroy those Motherfuckers.
